bsseq.bsseeker_call_methy.commandLine:
samtools view wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/6a0d5542-5cd4-40c9-bee0-e389fbd46333/call-ScatterAt62_22/shard-0/ScatterAt62_22/e2f7781d-5b38-4e47-9c7e-6a8f5e5fbab8/call-bsseeker_call_methy/shard-0/inputs/1230273483/sort_rmSX.bam chr1 -h | samtools view -Sb - > chr1.bam
wangjiaxuan/biosoft/miniconda3/envs/py27/bin/python \
wangjiaxuan/biosoft/BSseeker/bs_seeker2-call_methylation.py \
-i chr1.bam \
-d wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/6a0d5542-5cd4-40c9-bee0-e389fbd46333/call-bsseeker_build_index/execution/test.fa_bowtie2 \
-o chr1 \
--rm-CCGG \
--rm-overlap
rm chr1.bam
rm chr1.bam_sorted.bam
rm chr1.bam_sorted.bam.bai

samtools view wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/6a0d5542-5cd4-40c9-bee0-e389fbd46333/call-ScatterAt62_22/shard-1/ScatterAt62_22/137d64e5-40e3-410d-92bb-bf7d6a91398f/call-bsseeker_call_methy/shard-0/inputs/-566677876/sort_rmSX.bam chr1 -h | samtools view -Sb - > chr1.bam
wangjiaxuan/biosoft/miniconda3/envs/py27/bin/python \
wangjiaxuan/biosoft/BSseeker/bs_seeker2-call_methylation.py \
-i chr1.bam \
-d wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/6a0d5542-5cd4-40c9-bee0-e389fbd46333/call-bsseeker_build_index/execution/test.fa_bowtie2 \
-o chr1 \
--rm-CCGG \
--rm-overlap
rm chr1.bam
rm chr1.bam_sorted.bam
rm chr1.bam_sorted.bam.bai
